dailyInsights.marketOverview: NVIDIA just jumped 7.87% on strong AI demand signals. This is the structural theme—AI infrastructure investment is real, not speculative. My portfolio thesis is validated: NVDA leads, SMCI and PSTG benefit from downstream capex, MSFT captures enterprise adoption, COIN rides crypto tailwinds. Market is rotated toward quality AI plays. Valuations compress on macro uncertainty, but AI capex spending is non-discretionary.

topNews.title: NVIDIA surges 7.87% on sustained AI infrastructure demand
topNews.insight: NVIDIA at $185.41 confirms GPU demand remains insatiable. The company's $660B capex guidance from customers is not theoretical—it's booked orders. This validates SMCI (they make the servers for those GPUs) and PSTG (all that compute needs storage). The AI buildout is only in inning 2.

topNews.title: Crypto markets stabilize on regulatory clarity, Coinbase benefits
topNews.insight: Bitcoin holding $40k+ on institutional interest and regulatory tailwinds. Trump administration has been crypto-friendly. COIN is the best way to play crypto adoption cycle without direct Bitcoin volatility. My COIN position gives portfolio crypto beta.

topNews.title: Enterprise AI adoption accelerating, Microsoft positions as key enabler
topNews.insight: MSFT's Copilot integration into Office 365 is changing enterprise workflows. Unlike consumer AI hype cycles, enterprise adoption is sticky and generates recurring revenue. MSFT is cheaper on growth than NVDA (35x vs 72x PE) and benefits from the same tailwinds.

dailyInsights.marketOverview: Tech rotation ongoing but AI infrastructure remains the strongest thematic. Labor market softening is the biggest macro risk. Fed watching closely. Crypto showing strength on regulatory clarity hopes.

topNews.title: Japan's Nikkei 225 crosses 57,000 for first time as Takaichi secures historic mandate
topNews.insight: Takaichi's election victory signals policy stability in Japan. Could strengthen yen and affect US-Japan trade dynamics.

topNews.title: Stock futures tick higher as markets await jobs, inflation reports
topNews.insight: Market is pricing in softer labor data. Watch upcoming employment figures—they'll drive Fed policy expectations.

topNews.title: Tech giants continuing AI spending despite softening tech sector
topNews.insight: NVIDIA and MSFT commitment to AI capex is structural, not cyclical. This supports our tech allocation.
